start.text: You wake up in a dark forest, the sound of rustling leaves surrounding you. You remember nothing. A path splits ahead.

cabin_outside.text: You find yourself in front of an old workers cabin. The door is slightly ajar, you can see a dull light coming from inside.

cabin_inside.text: The cabin is empty, save for a filthy, slept in cot and a flickering candle on a table. A tattered note and a rusty dagger lay next to it.

item.name: Mysterious Note
item.description: A cryptic message scrawled in an unknown language.

item.name: Rusty Dagger
item.description: A small, rusted blade. Better than nothing.

pick_up_dagger.text: You pick up the dagger. It's rusty and dull, but it's better than nothing.

mysterious_note.text: The note is written in a strange language, you can't make out the words. You feel a chill run down your spine. You fold up the note and put it in your pocket.

examine_candle.text: It's a candle, burned down to a nub. The flame flickers in the drafty cabin.

deep_dark_forest.text: The forest grows darker and darker, you can barely see your hand in front of your face. You hear a low growl.

fight_wolf.text: You grip the rusty dagger and prepare for the worst. The creature lunges at you, instinctively you thrust the dagger into its neck. It falls to the ground, dead.

choices.text: Push the wolf off you and continue along the path
